BANK HOLIDAYS: December 26, 2022, and January 2, 2023 – Payments paused
Bitstamp payments paused on December 26, 2022, and January 2, 2023, due to public holidays.

Due to public holidays December 26, 2022, and January 2, 2023, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for all incoming and outgoing payments will be paused.

Deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day.

Credit card transactions, including PayPal, Google Pay and Apple Pay, are not affected.

If you need any help, please contact us at  support@bitstamp.net

We wish everyone happy holidays from Bitstamp!
